WAN FAZLI WAN MUSA

Papa & Husband

This is my father, 54 years old. He likes fries more than his childs do. Good at making dad jokes. Pro in playing any music instruments which is I proud.

WAN HAWANI WAN HASSAN

Umi & Wife

This is the love of my life, 47 years old. The one that can own anything in this world. Cooks the best food in the world. Breathlessly beautiful.

WAN NUR SYAHRAN WAN FAZLI

First brother

My older brother, 29 years old. Sometimes can be very helpful, sometimes can be annoying. Pro at eating other's food without permission

WAN NUR SYAZWAN AIDIN WAN FAZLI

Second brother

My second brother, 26 years old. When it comes to money problem, then this guy would be the solution. Loves buying snack but not eating them. Weird.

WAN NUR ALIS ALISYA WAN FAZLI

First sister

This is me, the first daughter. The most judgmental sibling. If anyone touch her things, she will burn the house. 22 years old.

WAN NUR ADRIENA ANNIESYA WAN FAZLI

Younger sister

Youngest sister and sibling. Love asking for money. But the one that actually can count on when needed. 16 years old.
